heroSection.title:
Festival Board
of
heroSection.description: Everything you need to know about the festivals in Roquetes is just one click away.

aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.description: The Patronat de Festes de Roquetes is an independent, non-political, non-profit organization responsible for organizing festivals and events for the town of Roquetes, Tarragona. Here you can find all the information about upcoming events and much more.

wantToParticipateSection.title: Want to participate?
wantToParticipateSection.firstPar: There are many ways to help and participate in setting up parties and events that take place throughout the year.
wantToParticipateSection.secondPar: You can participate by becoming a member of the association and enjoy all the events of the year, which also includes entry to the town's annual major festivals.
wantToParticipateSection.thirdPar: If you have a group of friends, you can also participate by registering as a crew in the crew contest held every year.
wantToParticipateSection.linksPar: <2>Click here</2> to see the requirements to participate in the crew contest or <1>here</1> to register as a member.

underConstruction.askUs: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
